channel.title: Adding custom prayers from another server?
channel.description:
Hey,
I have a 317, and another 317 source with some custom prayers...
How do I edit these prayers and leech them into my current server? I know it sounds idiotic, but..why not try :P

item.title: Adding custom prayers from another server?
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

redrover:

look for the code, paste it into you’re server, and u gotta edit your client too, if you are trying to add Turmoil or use a client that already have that

That is NOT helpful at all. Basically your telling him to leech which is a big NO NO. And telling them to get a client that has it is IDIOTIC. GTFO these forums!

If you wan’t to do it yourself heres what you have to do:

  1. Get a 317 cache interface editor (Lin’s works PERFECT in the Client Hacking section)
  2. Get a cache dump of the current RS images
  3. Edit away with your interface editor. It may also have the ability to add a new interface, but i’m not sure.
  4. Add the appropriate codes to your server dependent on what they do.

If you don’t want to spend the time look around the Client Hacking section and you’ll find a lot of cool stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding custom prayers from another server?
